data.message:
Waaaaaah!!! Trump didnt respond to my irrelevant ill-thought out diss and half-hearted attempt to stir up the piss that I call a career. I'm a has-been rapper ravaged by time, and using words that aren't even mine to ride on the coat tails of bullet points put out by Soros. I tried to make him notice me, but he's too busy actually ADULTING while I'm flailing and failing and crying n whining like a fake ass bitch with a seven year itch.
Sit down before you fall, especially after you get the call that your album sales didnt even touch the wall.
